= MOVES =
1. Expansion - movement up/down
2. Retracement - fast jump and then slow movement back, after which the movement continues in jump direciton
3. Reversal - hitting the max/min point twice/trice after which the movement direction is reversed
4. Consolidation - small movements in the range. After moving from the range border to the middle point and back the move outside of the range is expected
